choices: It's school day ! You head to the university to do a normal day
It's school day ! But you have some sport on the basket club today. Damn
It's weekend ! You are staying at the flat
It's weekend ! But you want to go study on the library
It's weekend ! Let's go hang out on the city !
1.content:
The sun is shining and the birds singing, nothing really interesting here. You are waking up, it's another day that's begin for you. Will it be normal or full of shenanigan ? Enora and Gwen are still in the flat, they have the regenerating device in case something happens to you. You sure hope it won't be the case, of course.

Since you are little, you are affected by this toon factor effect. You are the only person affected by it and its strange, midly disturbing rules. With time, you are knowing all of them, sadly because many people tried different things on you. But you don't really want to think about that ! It's a great new day that being, and nothing will happen to you today ! (sure)

But, first, you need to know what day of the week it is, and what you will do !
1.title: Yet another day that begin

choices: You encounter someone before arriving to the classroom.
11.content:
We are Monday, and it's the first working day of the week. Welp, let's go in the university, then ! On this morning, you have one course of criminal sociolog (two hours) and one of statistics (two hours). You aren't really eager to go to it, because it's still the morning and that you would like to have at least one more hour to relax. You are also a bit afraid of what could happens to you today.


You are walking toward the university. But will it be a normal day, or will something happens to you ? First, does something happens to you before going to the lesson ?
11.title: University day !

112.content:
You have arrived to the classroom without any problem, nice ! You are a bit later than most other student too, and there are only a few place left. All the students are chatting, like always, and the teacher isn't here yet. You will have to choose a set pretty fast if you want to not be the one that'll explain the lesson to the other.

Next to who do you sit ?
112.title: You go to your lesson.

choices: She wants you to do something to her
She wants to do something to you
1122.content:
One hour of boring lesson later, you finally get a pause. You really like your study, except when the teacher is as boring as now. You are heading out to get a coffee, when you see Shania get to you. She seems to be a bit hesitant, shy as she is, but seems to really want something.

What does she want ?
1122.title: Sitting next to Shania

choices: She want you to vore her.
She wants you to take one of her part.
11221.content:
« I- I want to try what it is to go through a toon effect » whisper her to your ear

You are surprised. You didn't know that she was kinda masochist, and you are thinking about that. She is cute, and she could be some great fun. And the teacher wouldn't even really notice her absence, so…

First, what do she want ?
11221.title: She wants you to do something to her

112211.content:
« I- I want to be eaten by you »

You are kinda stunned by this revelation. She wants to be eaten ? You know how much being digested is weird. Do you accept something like that or do you refuse ?
112211.title: She want you to vore her.

1122111.content:
Well, if she really wants to, why not try to do that to her ? For once you won't be the victim of it !

You go back silently into the class to take her affair. She won't really need it for some time… or maybe even forever ? You then go back with her in some seculed place you know - that is basically where people go to do things to you. It's a small empty room in the university, that can be closed from inside, and with some door to be able to go out from some bushed. The perfect hiding place. It's like the university want some weird stuff to happens.

You begin to take off the cloth of Shania, that is blushing really hard. She is quite cute… and all of that is becoming some pudge or cum in a few time. So the big question is here : how do you vore her ?
1122111.title: Accept

11221111.content:
You begin to take her to your month. You first kiss her a bit, making her blush even more.

– "You're a prey, I can do what I want !" you say.

She shyly laugh a bit, feeling a bit weird about being eaten and wanting it. You don't wait her to finish to get her to your mouth. You begin to slowly let her enter your mouth, and slide to your easophagus. With how your body can stretch, it's just a matter of time before she is all in your stomach.

She is slightly moving, making you feel good.

– "Wo-wow, that's weird… I-I think I'm beggining to melt"

She's right, you feel her beggining to soften a bit. It's time to you to think what you will do with her when she is just a bunch of pudge…
11221111.title: Oral vore

info.brief_description: You are a student affected by a strange disease, the toon factor that try to live his life
info.description:
You are a young man (Mike, 18) that his starting university, in a social sciences background. You are the normal nerdy boi in many respect : you are a bit of a lazy lad, you like videogame and you are especially shy. The only exception with that normal world is that you are affected by a strange disease known as the toon factor : your body react like a toon character ! It's not contagious, but you can affect other people

You live with your two flatmate Enora and Gwenael (that's a boy name), that are friendly but sometimes quite weird.

Characters (all character are over 18)

- Mike : it's you, the toony boi.

- Enora : One of your flatmate. She is a funny girl, but quite a weirdo at some time. She is always talking about scientific stuff that you don't understand. She really like to "study" your toon factor.

- Gwenael : Your other flatmate. He is friendly but kinda invasive. The kind of guy that will try to solve your trouble for you, and that doesn't really know how to stop. He likes some strange stuff, and often makes joke about how his browser history is like a battlefield.

- Elizabeth : A kinda bully girl of your university. She likes to pick on you and to tease you. You have had a sexual relationship with her at a time when you were both drunk, and it makes sometime things a bit weird. She is quite of a loner. She is kinda tsundere, and it makes her crazy to know that.

- Seb : Another kinda bully boy. He is quite muscular and sportive, and - you must admit - quite good looking. He doesn't really likes nerd, and often bother you. He don't admit it, but he is really afraid to failing his studies. Despite his hard shell, his dream is to become a sociologist to talk about social issues.

- Shania : A shy girl, that is also part of your university. She doesn't talk often, and is quite intrigued (but doesn't want to bother you) by your toon factor. She got a strong but kinda closed-minded education, that make her hesitant to try everything new, even if she really wants too.

- Paul : Another boy, that looks like the sportive type… but that is basically even more a nerd than you. He is totally gay, and openly admit it. It's quite harder for him to admit feelings, though. He talks reaaally fast, and it get faster the more he is excited/interested by something.


Toon factor effects (please respect that, I'm a nerd and I like when my lore works well)

- You are basically immortal. You can be "destroyed", but your consciousness might remain in the different parts and you can be regenerated with a special device (both Enora and Gwen' have one)

- You don't really get unbearable pain when shenanigans happens to you, but some sort of really strange/weird discomfort.

- You can be stretched, flattened, squished, inflated like any cartoon character. With time you can get back to your normal form.

- You can be inserted quite easily in basically anything, even if it's way too small. A bottle ? It works. The mouth of someone else ? No problem. A vacuum cleaner ? Perfect. As long as you are in it, you are stuck.

- Really hot temperature + humidity can melt you. Regrowing to your normal form is impossible without some help. (see later)

- You can be absorbed into cloth, and become one with it. Regrowing to your normal form is impossible without some help.

- Vore rules : you can be eaten and digested by other character (you will melt and your liquid form will be absorbed, no scat). You will be used to make grow a bodypart of the older, and your consciousness will be inside it your eater want to. If not, you won't exist until you are regenerated. You can't get to your normal form without help in this condition.

- Cock vore transform you into sentient cum (you can't move, though). Breast vore to sentient milk. You can't get to your normal form without help in this condition.

- All your bodyparts can be cut without arming you. They'll keep sensations until they are destroyed. To reattach them ? Just use some glue, it'll work !

- Someone can steal a cut bodypart by eating it. The bodypart will be destroyed by the stomach (you won't sense it) and one will grow on the thief (or it'll make grow the equivalent existing bodypart)

- The character can affect other character like if they had the toon factor. Meaning that you can put anybody in a bottle, voring them, steal one of their bodypart… They only get the toon effect that you used on them, though (for instance if you cut the arm of someone, they won't get any other toon effects than having an arm cut without harm). The device can remove the toon effect and get them to normal.

- When activated without aiming at a toon-affected person, the regenerating device will regenerate you and you only. To regenerate another destroyed person, you have to aim it to something that belong to them. The regeneration remove any effect you had on other people (for instance if someone stole a bodypart, he'll loose it)

- You have spare regenerating devices.


Rules :
- No underage. All characters must be over 18,
- No incest or no fetish interaction with familly members. Please not. Do not want.
- No scat/piss, things like that, too.
- If you add an ending, please add before a way out of it, to make other people able to continue the story from that point
- The main character is bisexual. He isn't bothered by relation with any gender. Technically, you can make everybody have a crush with the main character in a route if you want.
- I'm not the best at writing english, but let's all try to have chapter that are a minimum readable, okay ? :)

Aknowledgement :
- The "squishy universe" that made me try to do an interactive with some stretching and transformation, but with my own rules.
- The guillotine story, that inspired me the cutting rules
